MS.S: This module contains DSC resources for the management and configuration of Windows Server DNS Server.
Copyright the DSC Community contributors. All rights reserved.

## [3.0.0] - 2021-05-26_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Removed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsRecord_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The resource has been replaced by _DnsServerA_, _DnsServerPtr_,_x000D__x000A_ and _DnsServerCName_ ([issue #221](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/221))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerMx_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The resource has been replaced by _DnsServerMx_ ([issue #228](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/228))._x000D__x000A_- DnsServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `Forwarders` and `ForwardingTimeout` has_x000D__x000A_ been removed ([issue #192](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/192))._x000D__x000A_ Use the resource _DnsServerForwarder_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `EnableEDnsProbes` and `EDnsCacheTimeout` has_x000D__x000A_ been removed ([issue #195](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/195))._x000D__x000A_ Use the resource _DnsServerEDns_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `SecureResponses`, `MaxCacheTTL`, and_x000D__x000A_ `MaxNegativeCacheTTL` has been removed ([issue #197](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/197))._x000D__x000A_ To enforce theses properties, use resource _DnsServerEDns_ using the_x000D__x000A_ properties `EnablePollutionProtection`, `MaxTtl`, and `MaxNegativeTtl`_x000D__x000A_ respectively._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `DefaultAgingState`, `ScavengingInterval`,_x000D__x000A_ `DefaultNoRefreshInterval`, and `DefaultRefreshInterval` have been removed._x000D__x000A_ Use the resource _DnsServerScavenging_ to enforce this properties ([issue #193](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/193))._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `NoRecursion`, `RecursionRetry`, and_x000D__x000A_ `RecursionTimeout` has been removed ([issue #200](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/200))._x000D__x000A_ To enforce theses properties, use resource _DnsServerRecursion_ using the_x000D__x000A_ properties `Enable`, `RetryInterval`, and `Timeout` respectively._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: A few properties that are not supported by any DNS_x000D__x000A_ Server PowerShell cmdlet was moved to the new resource _DnsServerSettingLegacy_._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `DsPollingInterval` and `DsTombstoneInterval`_x000D__x000A_ has been removed ([issue #252](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/252))._x000D__x000A_ Use the resource _DnsServerDsSetting_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- ResourceBase_x000D__x000A_ - For the method `Get()` the overload that took a `[Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimInstance]`_x000D__x000A_ was removed as it is not the correct pattern going forward._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- DnsServerDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource_x000D__x000A_ - _DnsServerCache_ - resource to enforce cache settings ([issue #196](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/196))._x000D__x000A_ - _DnsServerRecursion_ - resource to enforce recursion settings ([issue #198](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/198))._x000D__x000A_ - Added new private function `Get-ClassName` that returns the class name_x000D__x000A_ or optionally an array with the class name and all inherited base class_x000D__x000A_ named._x000D__x000A_ - Added new private function `Get-LocalizedDataRecursive` that gathers_x000D__x000A_ all localization strings from an array of class names. This can be used_x000D__x000A_ in classes to be able to inherit localization strings from one or more_x000D__x000A_ base class. If a localization string key exist in a parent class's_x000D__x000A_ localization string file it will override the localization string key_x000D__x000A_ in any base class._x000D__x000A_ - Fixed code coverage in the pipeline ([issue #246](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/246))._x000D__x000A_- ResourceBase_x000D__x000A_ - Added new method `Assert()` tha calls `Assert-Module` and `AssertProperties()`._x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordNs_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage NS records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordNsScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped NS records_x000D__x000A_- DnsServerDsSetting_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage AD-integrated DNS settings_x000D__x000A_- DnsServerSettingLegacy_x000D__x000A_ - A new resource to manage legacy DNS Server settings that are not supported_x000D__x000A_ by any DNS Server PowerShell cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- DnsServerDsc_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: Renamed the module to DnsServerDsc ([issue #179](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/179))._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: Removed the prefix 'x' from all MOF-based resources_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #179](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/179))._x000D__x000A_ - Renamed a MOF-based resource to use the prefix 'DSC' ([issue #225](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/225))._x000D__x000A_ - Fix stub `Get-DnsServerResourceRecord` so it throws if it is not mocked_x000D__x000A_ correctly ([issue #204](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/204))._x000D__x000A_ - Switch the order in the deploy pipeline so that creating the GitHub release_x000D__x000A_ is made after a successful release._x000D__x000A_ - Updated stub functions to throw if they are used (when missing a mock in_x000D__x000A_ unit test) ([issue #235](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DnsServerDsc/issues/235))._x000D__x000A_- ResourceBase_x000D__x000A_ - Added support for inherit localization strings and also able to override_x000D__x000A_ a localization string that exist in a base class._x000D__x000A_ - Moved more logic from the resources into the base class for the method_x000D__x000A_ `Test()`, `Get()`, and `Set()`. The base class now have three methods_x000D__x000A_ `AssertProperties()`, `Modify()`, and `GetCurrentState()` where the_x000D__x000A_ two latter ones must be overridden by a resource if calling the base_x000D__x000A_ methods `Set()` and `Get()`._x000D__x000A_ - Moved the `Assert-Module` from the constructor to a new method `Assert()`_x000D__x000A_ that is called from `Get()`, `Test()`, and `Set()`. The method `Assert()`_x000D__x000A_ also calls the method `AssertProperties()`. The method `Assert()` is not_x000D__x000A_ meant to be overridden, but can if there is a reason not to run_x000D__x000A_ `Assert-Module` and or `AssertProperties()`._x000D__x000A_- Integration tests_x000D__x000A_ - Added commands in the DnsRecord* integration tests to wait for the LCM_x000D__x000A_ before moving to the next test._x000D__x000A_- DnsServerCache_x000D__x000A_ - Moved to the same coding pattern as _DnsServerRecursion_._x000D__x000A_- DnsServerEDns_x000D__x000A_ - Moved to the same coding pattern as _DnsServerRecursion_._x000D__x000A_- DnsServerScavenging_x000D__x000A_ - Moved to the same coding pattern as _DnsServerRecursion_._x000D__x000A_- DnsServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ - Changed to use `Get-DnsServerSetting` and `Set-DnsServerSetting`_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #185](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/185))._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The property `DisableAutoReverseZones` have been renamed_x000D__x000A_ to `DisableAutoReverseZone`._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The property `ListenAddresses` have been renamed_x000D__x000A_ to `ListeningIPAddress`._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The property `AllowUpdate` was changed to a boolean_x000D__x000A_ value (`$true` or `$false`) since that is what the cmdlet `Set-DnsServerSetting`_x000D__x000A_ is expecting (related to [issue #101](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/101))._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The property `EnableDnsSec` was changed to a boolean_x000D__x000A_ value (`$true` or `$false`) since that is what the cmdlet `Set-DnsServerSetting`_x000D__x000A_ is expecting._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The property `ForwardDelegations` was changed to a boolean_x000D__x000A_ value (`$true` or `$false`) since that is what the cmdlet `Set-DnsServerSetting`_x000D__x000A_ is expecting._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Logic bug in DnsRecordPtr.expandIPv6String($string) (#255)_x000D__x000A_ - Supporting tests added
